briefTitle: Molecular Imaging of HER2 Expression in HER2-positive Breast Cancer Using 99mTc-ADAPT6 vs 99mTc-DARPinG3
officialTitle: SPECT Imaging of Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2) Using 99mTc-ADAPT6 and 99mTc-DARPinG3 in HER2-positive Breast Cancer Patients Before System (Chemo/Targeted) Therapy.
